A

account - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
A vector of Account objects that is used to store account holder details read from oldmast.txt file and perform operations like combining balance, setting or getting the data members of underlying type, iterating over the collection to perform file matching operation and writing data back to newmast.txt file.
Account - Class in sdds.lab2.task1
Account class holds data, that is stored inside the master data file for each account.
Account() - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A default constructor that initializes an empty instance of Account by calling the three argument constructor.
Account(long, String, double) - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A custom constructor that initializes an instance of Account and its data members to the values that are passed in as arguments to this constructor.
accountNumber - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A unique account number that is being retrieved from the master data file and then stored into this attribute.
accountNumber - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A unique account number that is being retrieved from the master data file and then stored into this attribute.

B

balance - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
Balance of the account holder that is a running total of transactions and payments made by the account holder at the end of each billing cycle.

C

combine(TransactionRecord) - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
This method stores result of balance stored within the current instance and any transactions that the user might have in any given cycle back into the current instance's balance attribute.

D

deserializeMasterData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method deserializes the serialized object information that is stored within oldmast.txt by opening the file in input stream mode and then deserializes the object information stored onto the file by casting the data and then adds it to collection instance variable "account", to make it accessible later to perform operations onto that collection object.
deserializeTransactionData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method deserializes the serialized object information that is stored within trans.txt by opening the file in input stream mode and then deserializes the object information stored onto the file by casting the data and then adds it the collection instance variable "trRecord", to make it accessible later to perform operations onto that collection object.

F

FileMatch - Class in sdds.lab2.task1
FileMatch class implementation serializes dummy data provided into oldmast.txt and trans.txt and deserializes, serialized data from those two files into a Vector of Account and TransactionRecord objects respectively.
FileMatch() - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
The constructor plays a vital role in this application.

G

getAccountNumber() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A public getter method that returns the accountNumber attribute stored within current object when called.
getAccountNumber() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A public getter method that returns the accountNumber attribute stored within current object when called.
getBalance() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A public getter method that returns the balance attribute stored within current object when called.
getName() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
A public getter method that returns the name attribute stored within current object when called.
getTransactionAmount() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A public getter method that returns the transactionAmount attribute stored within current object when called.

M

main(String[]) - Static method in class sdds.lab2.task1.Task1Tester
main function calls, readMasterData function that attempts to read master data from a file, readTransactionData function that attempts to read transaction data from a file, writeData function that attempts to write data either to master file or a log file.

N

name - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.Account
Holds the name of the account holder.

S

sdds.lab2.task1 - package sdds.lab2.task1
 
serializeMasterData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method serializes the dummy data provided for this application and writes it onto a file named oldmast.txt.
serializeTransactionData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method serializes the dummy data provided for this application and writes it onto a file named trans.txt.

A public setter method that sets the accountNumber attribute stored within current object when called.

T

Task1Tester - Class in sdds.lab2.task1
Task1Tester is a class that merely instantiates a FileMatch class object and then calls three important methods that read and write data from and to the file.
Task1Tester() - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.Task1Tester
 
transactionAmount - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A transaction amount of the account holder that is either a purchase, indicated as positive number or payment indicated as negative number made by the account holder at any given time, during a transaction.
TransactionRecord - Class in sdds.lab2.task1
TransactionRecord class holds data, that is stored inside the transaction file for each account for a given period.
TransactionRecord() - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A default constructor that initializes an empty instance of Account.
TransactionRecord(long, double) - Constructor for class sdds.lab2.task1.TransactionRecord
A custom constructor that initializes an instance of TransactionRecord and its data members to the values that are passed in as arguments to this constructor.
trRecord - Variable in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
A vector of TransactionRecord objects that is used to store account holder details read from trans.txt file and perform operations like setting or getting the data members of underlying type, iterating over the collection to perform file matching operation and logging messages to log.txt file.

V

viewNewMasterData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method simply displays the deserialized data stored within the instance variable "account", to the console for the user to view the updated account information(master data) after the current period has ended.
viewOldMasterData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method simply displays the deserialized data stored within the instance variable "account", to the console for the user to view master data stored within oldmast.txt file.
viewTransactions() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method simply displays the deserialized data stored within the instance variable "trRecord", to the console for the user to view transaction record information stored within trans.txt file.

W

writeData() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method iterates over the collection of Account and TransactionRecord vector objects to check if there is match between the records of transaction and master data by comparing the account number of an account element over the number of trRecord elements.
writeToLogFile() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method writes the collection data of trRecord to the log.txt file.
writeToMasterFile() - Method in class sdds.lab2.task1.FileMatch
This method writes the collection data of instance variable "account" to the newmast.txt file by serializing each element.
